text: Bañado Norte is a slum village in Asuncion, Paraguay, near the Paraguay River.Javier de Diego, Rosa Flores, Daniel Burke, Pope visits slum village in Paraguay, CNN, July 2, 2015 It was visited by Pope Francis on July 12, 2015. There is a Roman Catholic chapel called Chapel of San Juan Bautista. ==References== Category:Neighbourhoods of Asunción
title: Bañado Norte
